name: @nimbus-cli/nimbus
description: Nimbus CLI - AI-powered infrastructure assistant for Terraform, Kubernetes, Helm, and cloud operations
author: The AI Project Co. <hello@theaiproject.co> (https://github.com/the-ai-project-co)

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir=dist --target=bun --minify --external react-devtools-core --external ink --external ink-text-input --external ink-spinner --external ink-select-input --external react && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.build:npm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir=dist --target=bun --minify --external react-devtools-core --external ink --external ink-text-input --external ink-spinner --external ink-select-input --external react && chmod +x dist/index.js && chmod +x bin/nimbus.mjs
scripts.build:node: bun build src/index.ts --outdir=dist --target=node --minify --external react-devtools-core --external ink --external ink-text-input --external ink-spinner --external ink-select-input --external react && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='dist/index.js';const c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');if(!c.startsWith('#!')){fs.writeFileSync(f,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+c)}" && chmod +x dist/index.js
